wedo_instance.description: Final strike for the Lablab.ai hackathon submission. Due 5:00 PM Today.

meta.philosophy: Ship fast, ship forensic. The substrate is ready; the realization is imminent.

tasks.description: Finalize code and verify remote synchronization at git@github.com:diy-make/clawed.git.
Refine short (255 chars) and long (100+ words) descriptions in hackathon_requirements.json.
Deploy demo application to a public URL (Vercel/Replit).
Generate PDF Slide Presentation (succinct, 2-3 sentences per slide).
Record and finalize 5-minute MP4 presentation (Intro + Slides + Functionality).
Select Technology and Category tags on Lablab dashboard.
Complete Lablab.ai submission form with all required links and assets.
